import React from "react"; export const MultiDayWeatherForecast = ({forecast}) => { return ( {forecast.forecastday.map(day => ( ))}
Date Weather Temperature Humidity Max Wind Speed (MPH)
{day.date} `${day.maxtemp_f} F / ${day.mintemp_f} F` {day.avghumidity} {day.maxwind_mph}
) }
